## Setup for data analysis
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(psych)

data_path <- "P:/StudyData/RISK2/Methods/measures/development/item_analyses/pss"
```


## Full 10 item scale
```{r}

pss <- read_rds(file.path(data_path, "PSS_Risk1.rds")) %>% 
  select(contains("PSS_")) %>% 
  glimpse()

alpha(as.matrix(pss), keys = c("PSS_4","PSS_5","PSS_7","PSS_8"))
```
